name: Newgothic Movement 2
summary: Newgothic Movement 2 (also known as New Gothic Movement II) is a seventeen-map Doom II megawad for Boom-compatible source ports by Christopher Shepherd (ArmouredBlood) and Arthur O. (Archi). It is a sequel to 2010's Newgothic Movement 1 and features a similar slaughter map style of gameplay.
